sections.title: A bit about Taxdown
texts: At TaxDown, we are revolutionizing the world of tax declarations, making them accessible, simple, and advantageous for everyone. We seek innovative minds to help us turn this vision into an everyday reality. Join us in making the fiscal future a clearer and fairer place for all.
With hundreds of thousands of clients and a growing team, Taxdown uses Sttok for managing incentive plans and shareholder relations for meetings, shareholder register, etc.

sections.title: Why did they choose us?
texts: 1. For the ease of use of the platform.
2. For the automation of manual tasks.
3. For the management of the Shareholder Register (Cap Table).
4. For document generation and automated signing.
5. For the management of Incentive Plans.
